pullRequest.title: Vijay long poll link abort fix
pullRequest.bodyText: When a long poll receive request (something that waits for 60 minutes) is pending and the link is aborted, then that pending request will remain pending for the whole timeout period even though messages are available in the entity. Fixed it. Added a test. Also updating the version of the SDK.

commit.message:
Chaning two acceptAsync methods to use internal thread pool.
And depcreating and renaming two methods as their spellings were wrong.
Fixing a bug with where long polling receive requests are not completed or retried on link abort and recreate.
Set message id and session id of the first message in a send batch on the combined batch message.
